name: The Legend of The Toast at Nordic Game Jam 2019
name_original: The Legend of The Toast at Nordic Game Jam 2019
description: Indulge in the comfort of toast, as you catch ingredients falling from the sky for no discernible reason.  Empty your mind of game mechanics, asset lists and countless lines of faulty code, and instead focus on the limitless potential of free toast. The sky is the limit and the definitions vague. A toast can be whatever you want, as long as it's toasted - Discover them all!
